name: deliverer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who saves someone from a painful or bad experience: Moses was the deliverer of the Israelites from Egypt. She thanked her deliverers, with tears rather than words. See
deliver
More examplesFewer examplesIn his moment of triumph he did not forget his deliverer.He was a prophet sent to be a ruler and a deliverer.The image provides support for those who believe in her divine power as the deliverer from oppression.
